Module it.polimi.ingsw.am38
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Controller class for a single Game

    void
    chooseColor(Player p, Color c)
    Lets the Player choose their color and calls postColorSelectionSetUp() if all Players have chosen their color

    Lets the Player choose the ObjectiveCard they prefer out of the 2 drawn and calls randomPlayerTurnOrder() if all Players in the Game have chosen their personal ObjectiveCard

    Getter method for the list of winners
    void
    passTurn()
    Method that manages the turns flow and execution: checks for end-Game phase conditions, shuts down the Game if no Players are connected to it, handles the passing of turns and skips the turn of a Player if they're not connected, starts a countdown timer if only one Player is connected and when the end-Game phase ends announces the Winner(s)

      Constructor of GameController.

  • Method Details

    • playerPlay

      public void playerPlay(int card, int x, int y, boolean b) throws InvalidInputException, NoPossiblePlacement, NotPlaceableException
      Method that manages the play (a PlayableCard) action of a Player
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - if the facing chosen for the PlayableCard is not valid
      NoPossiblePlacement - if the positioning of chosen PlayableCard is not valid
      NotPlaceableException

    • playerDraw

      public void playerDraw(String type, int index) throws EmptyDeckException, InvalidInputException
      Method that manages the draw action of a Player
      Throws:
      EmptyDeckException - if the deck from which the player wants to draw from isEmpty
      InvalidInputException - if the command given by the Player isn't a valid one

    • passTurn

      public void passTurn()
      Method that manages the turns flow and execution: checks for end-Game phase conditions, shuts down the Game if no Players are connected to it, handles the passing of turns and skips the turn of a Player if they're not connected, starts a countdown timer if only one Player is connected and when the end-Game phase ends announces the Winner(s)

    • chooseStarterCardFacing

      public void chooseStarterCardFacing(Player p, boolean f)
      Lets the Player choose their StarterCard facing
      Parameters:
      p - Player whose choosing
      f - true is Face-up, false is Face-down

    • chooseColor

      public void chooseColor(Player p, Color c) throws ColorTakenException
      Lets the Player choose their color and calls postColorSelectionSetUp() if all Players have chosen their color
      Parameters:
      p - Player that's choosing their color
      c - the color chosen by the Player
      Throws:
      ColorTakenException

    • choosePersonalObjectiveCard

      public void choosePersonalObjectiveCard(Player p, int i) throws Exception
      Lets the Player choose the ObjectiveCard they prefer out of the 2 drawn and calls randomPlayerTurnOrder() if all Players in the Game have chosen their personal ObjectiveCard
      Parameters:
      p - Player that's choosing their personal ObjectiveCard
      i - 1= first one, 2 = second one
      Throws:
      Exception - (look at chooseObjectiveCard and randomPlayerTurn)

      Getter for the visible elements on a player's field

      an istance of the class VisibleElements

      public Game getGame()
      Getter method for this Game
      Returns:
      the Game this GameController controls

      public List<Player> getWinners()
      Getter method for the list of winners
      Returns:
      a list of Player of the players that have won
